      • getHeightOfTerrain

        public float getHeightOfTerrain(float worldX,
                       float worldZ)
        Return height of terrain at the worldX and worldZ coord. The coordinates are normalized to the terrain and then uses a algorithm barryCentric to calculate height of a point from the three vertex points comprising that points mesh triangle CALLING THIS METHOD WILL ONLY GIVE PROPER ANSWER IF COORDINATES CORRESPOND TO THIS TERRAIN
        Parameters:
        worldX - x coordinate on the world terrain
        worldZ - z coordinate on the world terrain
        Returns:
        height of terrain at given coordinate
